text: Hello! <#CSFGKSHT7|themes> can someone please tell me how I can select the design manager permission
When I try to get a Personal Access Key, it says that I don't have access. Can someone please tell me what I need to do?

Hi everyone. Thought I'd share how we're using Hubl in SASS in themes as it was a common question.

We're using Gulp & regular expressions to accomplish this. In our scss files we write out code such as `color: hubl("theme.icon.color");` , which Gulp will compile to `color: {{ theme.icon.color }};` . We're doing a similar thing for our background images, where our code such as `background-image: url("'/wasabi-lite-2/images/scroll-top-1.svg'")`  will compile to `background-image: url("{{ get_asset_url('/wasabi-lite-2/images/scroll-top-1.svg') }}")` .
Mind sending me a DM with a link to the HubSpot account?

how can we add padding on this

 {% dnd_module path='@HubSpot/rich_text'
          offset=0,
          width=5
        %}
